name: Chronos Silver
description: A masterpiece of engineering, the Chronos Silver features a precision automatic movement housed in a surgical-grade stainless steel case.

name: Midnight Leather
description: Elegant and understated, the Midnight Leather combines a minimalist black dial with a premium genuine leather strap for ultimate comfort.

name: Rose Elegance
description: Radiating sophistication, the Rose Elegance features 18k rose gold plating and a mother-of-pearl dial, perfect for formal occasions.

name: Aviator Gold
description: Inspired by aviation history, this timepiece offers dual-time functionality and a rugged yet luxurious gold finish.

name: Diver Pro
description: Built for the depths, the Diver Pro is water-resistant to 300m and features a rotating bezel and luminescent markers.

name: Classic Minimalist
description: Less is more. The Classic Minimalist strips away the unnecessary to reveal the pure beauty of timekeeping.

name: Royal Oak Style
description: An homage to iconic design, featuring an octagonal bezel and integrated bracelet for a sporty yet elegant look.

name: Ceramic White
description: Crafted from high-tech ceramic, this watch is scratch-resistant, hypoallergenic, and incredibly lightweight.
